trans-unit.source: Represents the exceptions that are thrown when an error is raised by the Peer-to-Peer Infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 表示当对等基础结构引发错误时所引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions of this type are specific to the PNRP platform, and indicate that the underlying platform could not perform a certain operation.
trans-unit.target: 此类型的异常特定于 PNRP 平台，并指明基础平台不能执行某项操作。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException" /> 类的新默认实例。

trans-unit.source: The error message that provides the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 提供异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException" /> class with the supplied message string.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的消息字符串初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Reference to the object that holds the data needed to deserialize the object.
trans-unit.target: 对象的引用，该对象持有反序列化对象所需的数据。

trans-unit.source: Context that provides the means for deserializing the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException" /> data.
trans-unit.target: 提供反序列化 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException" /> 数据的方式的上下文。

trans-unit.source: Also referred to as the source of the serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 也称为序列化数据的源。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 用序列化数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException" />.
trans-unit.target: 解释 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException" /> 原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception instance that caused the current <see cref="T:System.Exception" />.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 的异常实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException" /> class with the supplied message string and exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的消息字符串和异常初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Contains the information required to serialize the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 包含序列化 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException" /> 对象所需的信息。

trans-unit.source: Contains the destination for the serialized stream associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 包含与 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException" /> 对象关联的序列化流的目标。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable" /> interface and returns the data needed to serialize the peer object.
trans-unit.target: 实现 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable" /> 接口，并返回序列化对等对象所需的数据。

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(n) operation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 o （n） 运算。

trans-unit.source: Contains the information required to serialize the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 包含序列化 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException" /> 实例所需的信息。

trans-unit.source: Contains the destination for the serialized stream associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 包含与 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException" /> 实例关联的序列化流的目标。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable" /> interface and returns the data needed to serialize the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 实现 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable" /> 接口，并返回序列化 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException" /> 实例所需的数据。
